ygData.subject: Re: New Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: i totally agree mik....fear needs to be fixed, and they need to stop screwing around in general....imho, htey got swamped with feedbacks on the box and changed
ygData.messageBody:
i totally agree mik....fear needs to be fixed, and they need to stop screwing
around in general....imho, htey got swamped with feedbacks on the box and
changed it back....so maybe if we all feedback this stuff, maybe it will get
fixed

Mikaela wrote:

> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela1@...>
>
> I, personally, am getting extremely disgusted with Verant. I think they
> should be focusing on some very serious problems, such as the Plane of Fear
> which they ruined and so many high levels leaving the game because of
> boredom, nothing to do and now this unfair "yield" policy.
>
> At the auction on Saturday, I saw two people buy Boxes of Abu-Kar, one for
> 1550 plat the other for 1700 plat. Two days later guess what...they are
> worth about 5 plat. Sure Verant....it was another "code error" or typo that
> you simply had to fix. Don't insult my intelligence!!
>
> I am about at the point where I am ready to leave EQ for another game or
> something where everytime you turn around the developers aren't shafting
> you. So many in my guild and on my server are simply leaving or selling
> their characters. And they aren't all level 50s either. I say shame on
> Verant for what they have done and are doing to the players.
>
> Just my opinion, as always.....flame away, because I really don't care
> anymore
>
> Mik
